title: When a Building abuts two or more streets, the setbacks from the streets shall be such as if the building is fronting on each of such streets
clause_text: When a Building abuts two or more streets, the setbacks from the streets shall be such as if the building is fronting on each of such streets.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: When a Building abuts two or more streets, the setbacks from the streets shall be such as if the building is fronting on each of such streets.
